text: @AndrewYang Whoever is crying the fatality rate...Fatality rate of flu is 1% while Coronavirus fatality rate is at least 4% in countries like France it is 12%+. Many deaths are happening *before* the test results. Majority of the population has some tolerance to flu and not Coronavirus.
